ud5.1:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ud5.1:1.3: Now at that time King Pasenadi of Kosala was upstairs in the royal longhouse together with Queen Mallikā.
ud5.1:1.4: Then King Pasenadi addressed Queen Mallikā,
ud5.1:1.5: “Mallikā, is there anyone more dear to you than yourself?”
